verbs.description: ' [ARGM-TMP: When] [ARG1: you] [V: ’re] [ARG2: almost 800 Billion Dollars a year down on Trade] , you ca n’t lose a Trade War ! The U.S. has been ripped off by other countries for years on Trade , time to get smart ! , ' Trump wrote on Saturday .
